replies.body: It's a bit sad to see this event retire, it was certainly one of my favourites due to the whole region mission aspect of it and the rewards being super cool. It also showed how the community would come together and finish some of the bosses with basically no time to spare
NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO I HAVE BEEN WAITING ALL YEAR WHY RITO!!!! WHY DID YOU DO THIS TO ME
me too bro me too.. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}
Sad to see this event go but it's been awesome, thanks Riot for all the hard work put into these events!
That's god damn amazing adorable good job riot{{sticker:darius-angry}}

thx rito, sad to see this go nothing quite like it to bring the comunity together with both art and gameplay. Even if it does not give anything that other quests give it was still fun to compete with my sibling about who had the more hours played and contributed the most to defeating the ocean week. Sad to see it go and I hope you have plans for a similar program in the future, even without rewards it was still fun to do
As a Tasmanian player I'm actually looking forward to seeing the devils when I'm able. {{sticker:sg-jinx}}
I don't think Yuno Jinx is the appropriate image to use there :)
nice work riot, good to see the efforts put in over the years

"it takes a lot of resources to run" wow better make a new lux skin then.

It is year of the dog, why is lux getting a skin? is she a dog?
Lux is a female dog if u get what I mean c;
$$ rip wallet

how much money does riot make??
i think when they said "it takes a lot of resources to run" is just a nicer way of them saying they don't care about us anymore
oh no... they might remove the OCE server and make us play in the NA server D: Dem good all days....

i wouldn't be surprised if that was next 
ah the good all days where you could play every game type

I never log on and I have been playing for around 5 years.  Just wanted to pop in and give my most sincere thanks to Riot for the rewards, especially the artificial reef and the wombat sanctuary.  Things that are truly needed and good for the environment.

I am disappointed that it is no longer being continued, but all good things must come to an end, and I thank you for being there even if it can't continue.
Never got to experience one but while reading about it, it sounded cool! GG Riot!
It feels great to know that somewhere on that Nautilus statue is my name. :D

A salute to Mechwolf the Destroyer.
and xayah.

Removing Ocean Week is unAustralian,  Sam Kekovich and I are dissapointed. Surely you could have utilised the in client mission system to make ocean week missions then just throw another statue in the ocean....

That moment, when it finally becomes obvious that riot care more about money than they do about their players, and enriching life in Aus as a whole

Well done...

it's easy to see they only care about money when every new skin they bring out is 1350+
NOT EVERY SKIN IS WORTH 1350 RITO
and this is why you never joke about calling a tasmanian devil mechwolf the destroyer
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}} there needs to be a anime about this
Then who is Yuno Jinx looking at? {{sticker:sg-jinx}}

So basically you don't want to take on promotional stuff like to help the environment now because Riot is a more profitable company?

Like, you don't have to get rid of it to save costs Riot, you could do smaller things like say donating small portion of funds from skins sold that week to whatever charity.
A travesty, someone should start a petition to bring this back!
{{sticker:galio-happy}} this is galio with no abs :(

no more ocean week, ever.

ITS GONE FOREVER NOW!!!!?!?!?!?!?! (NANI??) Well, the OCE Week was fun while it lasted :D Farewell :)

I'd like to see a proper charity event, like the last ocean week to come back soon. It's great for public image, and shows you really care, and having the community help out can be a great way to get more people to join in. Like, maybe a DOTA style compendium, where proceeds go to something like Doctors without borders.
